definition: to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: A specimen which is much thicker than the penetration depth decays exponentially.
sentences.chinese: 一個比穿深透度厚得多的樣品，按指數律衰減。

sentences.english: When covered by your hand, this antenna suffers from attenuation.
sentences.chinese: 當你用手覆蓋了這個點，天線信號就會衰減。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the phenomenon of the macroscopic quantum tunneling is also a decay process of metastable state.
sentences.chinese: 而宏觀量子隧穿現象同時又是一個亞穩態的衰減過程。

sentences.english: Accordingly, the circuit configuration of fader device is simplified.
sentences.chinese: 由此簡化衰減器裝置的電路結構。

sentences.english: This paper describes a middling-power thin Film attenuator used for microwave circuits.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種用於微波電路的中功率薄膜衰減器。

sentences.english: Both Polarization Dependent and Independent Variable Attenuators are possible.
sentences.chinese: 光纖衰減器有極化獨立和非獨立兩種。

sentences.english: Two kinds of program control signal attenuation circuits, which are used in circuit design, are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹線路設計中所應用的兩種程控信號衰減電路。

sentences.english: Solidification degree of PETN composite explosive would affect ultrasonic attenuation.
sentences.chinese: 介紹泰安混合炸藥固化程度對超聲波衰減的影響。

sentences.english: Near perfect reconstruction cosine-modulated filter banks with high stop attenuation can be achieved using the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 該方法可獲得很高阻帶衰減的餘弦調製濾波器組。

sentences.english: The attenuation weak spot is the black strip in the lower left corner of the band.
sentences.chinese: 天線的衰減弱點就是鋼圈左下角的黑色覆蓋物。

sentences.english: The result shows that the decay of residue chlorine is quick, and its impact on the marine environment very little.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，餘氯衰減很快，其對外環境的影響很小。

sentences.english: From the cross points through the elbow shielded region, the geometric attenuation can be rapidly determined in advance.
sentences.chinese: 由這肘形屏蔽領域的交點可快速預測輻射屏蔽衰減率。

sentences.english: The thick, multi-year ice has decreased by over 40 percent during that time.
sentences.chinese: 在這段時間內，多年冰厚度衰減40%多。

sentences.english: This helps reduce the rate at which your focus intensity decays.
sentences.chinese: 這能幫助你降低專注度衰減率。

sentences.english: The attenuation is extracted by the spectrum of the layers at different depth.
sentences.chinese: 利用不同深度界面的回波頻譜分析提取衰減係數剖面。

sentences.english: Preceding the shear peak point, there is a slippage section presenting an ascending lateral shear curve;
sentences.chinese: 而側阻力峯值之後的部分爲粘結段，呈下凹衰減曲線。
